text: If Scheana Marie's romantic past was a carnival ride, it would be more of a roller coaster than a glide through the tunnel of love. The Vanderpump Rules pal's marriage to Mike Shay ended in divorce ; shortly thereafter, her romantic relationship with longtime friend Rob Valletta was also put on ice. If breaking up is hard to do, then breaking up twice is even harder â€” and Scheana recently opened up about that in a major way. Speaking to Us Weekly, the SURver admitted that she cringes at certain scenes from Vanderpump Rules Season 6. ( Hint : She talked about Rob. A lot.
